AzureBlade: Maybe, or maybe not. After all, he is now even worse than
what Megatron was in the first wars... Whatever you attempt, be careful.

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen <roborick007@y...> wrote:
> : : Kup : :
> Kup: I see that it may eb a small chance, but after what he has
done, i think every living transformer owes him the chance.
> 
> 
> Nic <Proudwing500k@h...> wrote:AzureBlade seemed reluctant to accept
Kup's words.
> 
> AzureBlade: I understand how you feel, but I personaly don't think
> Prime can be brought back the way he was. There is a possibility that
> we might soften his personality, but I'm not convinced that we can get
> to the original Prime. From what intelligence has told me, the
> Tripreds seemed to have built him nearly from scratch. Still, there
> might be a chance, even though it must be a small one...
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen <roborick007@y...> wrote:
> > : : Kup : :
> > Kup: I have to believe that there is someway to get through to the
> real Prime. I've known him too long, I helped train him when he became
> Autobot Commander. His will is strong and good.
> > 
> > 
> > Nic <Proudwing500k@h...> wrote:AzureBlade sits down in face of Kup
> and nods his head.
> > 
> > AzureBlade: Of course. The Maximals and Predacons were arguing yet
> > again when the Tripreds arrived. They had been lurking in the ranks of
> > the Preds and had waited the right moment to strike. Even with both
> > the Maximal and Predacon armies, we were not able to resist them long.
> > We were cornered in Katatronia City. We decided to retreat so that we
> > could better resist them. We embarked on a ship, Maximals and
> > Predacons, and departed for Earth. There, we established the Survivor
> > Council.
> > 
> > He paused, letting the implications sink in.
> > 
> > AzureBlade: However, just a few weeks ago, we learned of Prime's
> > reconstruction and of the the Tripredacus plan. The Council sent me
> > after him because of my neutrality. I am as much a Predacon as I am a
> > Maximal. My role here is to contain or destroy Prime. He has become a
> > threat no one can afford to ignore, not even the Tripreds. We have to
> > thwart his plans.
> > 
> > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen <roborick007@y...> wrote:
> > > : : Kup : :
> > > Kup leads AzureBlade into his office.
> > > 
> > > Kup: Have a seat. We know that the Tripredacus have taken control of
> > Cybertron, and that they revived Optimus. Details are sketchy though.
> > You mind filling in the blanks, lad?
> > > 
> > > 
> > > Nic <Proudwing500k@h...> wrote:AzureBlade: I am afraid so. However,
> > since I have a lot to tell, we
> > > better go somewhere where we won't be disturbed. Things have changed
> > > dramatically since your departure from Cybertron.
> > > 
> > >
